card.name: Absolute Grace
card.text: All creatures have protection from black.

card.name: Absolute Law
card.text: All creatures have protection from red.

card.name: Abundance
card.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Abyssal Horror
card.text: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

card.name: Academy Researchers
card.text: When Academy Researchers enters the battlefield, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Academy Researchers.

card.name: Acidic Soil
card.text: Acidic Soil deals damage to each player equal to the number of lands he or she controls.

card.name: Annul
card.text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

card.name: Antagonism
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, Antagonism deals 2 damage to that player unless one of his or her opponents was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Arc Lightning
card.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Arcane Laboratory
card.text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Rune of Protection: Black
card.text: {W}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Rune of Protection: Blue
card.text: {W}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Rune of Protection: Green
card.text: {W}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Rune of Protection: Lands
card.text: {W}: The next time a land source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Rune of Protection: Red
card.text: {W}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Rune of Protection: White
card.text: {W}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Cycling {2}

card.name: Sanctum Custodian
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Sanctum Guardian
card.text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

card.text: Cycling {2}

card.name: Scald
card.text: Whenever a player taps an Island for mana, Scald deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Scoria Wurm
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return Scoria Wurm to its owner's hand.

card.name: Scrap
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Cycling {2}

card.name: Seasoned Marshal
card.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Serra Avatar
card.text: Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total. When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Serra Zealot
card.text: First strike

card.name: Serra's Embrace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.

card.name: Serra's Hymn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Hymn. Sacrifice Serra's Hymn: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Hymn.

card.name: Serra's Liturgy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Liturgy. {W}, Sacrifice Serra's Liturgy: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Liturgy.

card.name: Serra's Sanctum
card.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool for each enchantment you control.

card.name: Shimmering Barrier
Shivan Gorge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{R}, {T}: Shivan Gorge deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Shivan Hellkite
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Shivan Raptor
card.text: First strike, haste Echo {2}{R}

card.name: Shiv's Embrace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Show and Tell
card.text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Shower of Sparks
card.text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Sicken
Silent Attendant
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Skirge Familiar
card.text: Flying Discard a card: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Skittering Skirge
card.text: Flying When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.

card.name: Sleeper Agent
card.text: When Sleeper Agent enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Sleeper Agent deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Slippery Karst
Smokestack
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on Smokestack. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on Smokestack.

card.name: Smoldering Crater
Sneak Attack
card.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Somnophore
card.text: Flying Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Songstitcher
card.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.

card.name: Soul Sculptor
card.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.

card.name: Spined Fluke
card.text: When Spined Fluke enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Spined Fluke.

card.name: Spire Owl
card.text: Flying When Spire Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Sporogenesis
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature. Whenever a creature with a fungus counter on it dies, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each fungus counter on that creature. When Sporogenesis leaves the battlefield, remove all fungus counters from all creatures.

card.name: Spreading Algae
card.text: Enchant Swamp When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spreading Algae to its owner's hand.

card.name: Steam Blast
card.text: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Stern Proctor
card.text: When Stern Proctor enters the battlefield, return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.

card.name: Stroke of Genius
card.text: Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Sulfuric Vapors
card.text: If a red spell would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Sunder
card.text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Symbiosis
card.text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tainted AEther
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature or land.

card.name: Telepathy
card.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Temporal Aperture
card.text: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. Until end of turn, for as long as that card remains on top of your library, play with the top card of your library revealed and you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Thran Quarry
card.text: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Thran Quarry. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Thran Turbine
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may add {C} or {2} to your mana pool. You can't spend this mana to cast spells.

card.name: Time Spiral
card.text: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles his or her graveyard and hand into his or her library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

card.name: Titania's Boon
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Titania's Chosen
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Titania's Chosen.

card.name: Tolarian Academy
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool for each artifact you control.

card.name: Tolarian Winds
card.text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Torch Song
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Torch Song. {2}{R}, Sacrifice Torch Song: Torch Song deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of verse counters on Torch Song.

card.name: Treefolk Seedlings
card.text: Treefolk Seedlings's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

card.name: Treetop Rangers
card.text: Treetop Rangers can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

card.name: Turnabout
card.text: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

card.name: Umbilicus
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.

card.name: Unnerve
card.text: Each opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Unworthy Dead
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Unworthy Dead.

card.name: Urza's Armor
card.text: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Vampiric Embrace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. Whenever a creature dealt damage by enchanted creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Vebulid
card.text: Vebulid enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Vebulid. When Vebulid attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: Veil of Birds
card.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veil of Birds is an enchantment, Veil of Birds becomes a 1/1 Bird creature with flying.

card.name: Veiled Apparition
card.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Apparition is an enchantment, Veiled Apparition becomes a 3/3 Illusion creature with flying and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Veiled Apparition unless you pay {1}{U}."

card.name: Veiled Crocodile
card.text: When a player has no cards in hand, if Veiled Crocodile is an enchantment, Veiled Crocodile becomes a 4/4 Crocodile creature.

card.name: Veiled Sentry
card.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Sentry is an enchantment, Veiled Sentry becomes an Illusion creature with power and toughness each equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Veiled Serpent
card.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Serpent is an enchantment, Veiled Serpent becomes a 4/4 Serpent creature that can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Cycling {2}

card.name: Venomous Fangs
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature.

card.name: Vernal Bloom
card.text: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Viashino Outrider
card.text: Echo {2}{R}

card.name: Viashino Runner
card.text: Viashino Runner can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Viashino Sandswimmer
card.text: {R}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Viashino Sandswimmer to its owner's hand. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Viashino Sandswimmer.

card.name: Viashino Weaponsmith
card.text: Whenever Viashino Weaponsmith becomes blocked by a creature, Viashino Weaponsmith gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Victimize
card.text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Vile Requiem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Vile Requiem. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Vile Requiem: Destroy up to X target nonblack creatures, where X is the number of verse counters on Vile Requiem. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wall of Junk
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Junk blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: War Dance
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on War Dance. Sacrifice War Dance: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of verse counters on War Dance.

card.name: Waylay
card.text: Put three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens onto the battlefield. Exile them at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

card.name: Western Paladin
card.text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.

card.name: Whetstone
card.text: {3}: Each player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Whirlwind
card.text: Destroy all creatures with flying.

card.name: Wild Dogs
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Wild Dogs. Cycling {2}

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Windfall
card.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

card.text: Echo {4}{G}

card.name: Wirecat
card.text: Wirecat can't attack or block if an enchantment is on the battlefield.

card.name: Witch Engine

card.name: Wizard Mentor
card.text: {T}: Return Wizard Mentor and target creature you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Worn Powerstone
card.text: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Worship
card.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Edict
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Will
card.text: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

card.text: Flying; shroud
